pr_title: [CDAP-16236] Using keyvalue widget in runtime arguments modal

timeline.message: using keyvalue widget in runtime args

timeline.bodyText: Can you add a comment as to why this needs any?
timeline.author: ajainarayanan

timeline.bodyText: Same here. We should try avoiding using any but if we need to we should provide a comment to justify the necessity.
timeline.author: ajainarayanan

timeline.bodyText: Now that we have removed the checkboxes do we still need the provided?
timeline.author: ajainarayanan
ajainarayanan

timeline.bodyText: Where is this ::: coming from? I thought we decided to not use a string delimiter as we want to pass in the runtime arguments as is (object).
timeline.author: ajainarayanan

timeline.bodyText: this should follow the pattern on the AbstractRow to have construct and deconstruct methods that needs to be overwritten. It's clearer rather than overwriting init method.
timeline.author: elfenheart

timeline.bodyText: name component the same as the file name
timeline.author: elfenheart
elfenheart
